format: A data frame with 240 observations on the following 6 variables.
title: O'Brien and Kaiser's Repeated-Measures Data in "Long" Format
description:
Description
Contrived repeated-measures data from O'Brien and Kaiser (1985). For details see OBrienKaiser, which is for the "wide" form of the same data.
reference:
O'Brien, R. G., and Kaiser, M. K. (1985)
MANOVA method for analyzing repeated measures designs: An extensive primer.
Psychological Bulletin 97, 316–333, Table 7.

parameters.gender: a between-subjects factor with levels F, M.
parameters.treatment: a between-subjects factor with levels control, A, B.
parameters.phase: a within-subjects factor with levels pre, post, fup.
